Articles.Content:
I've been working a bit on trying to create a less "Rocket with the engine blown off" type looking of a base; so one of the things I realized was that I should have individual buildings for individual functions. Am rather happy with the power station, (and I'm located at the north pole so plenty of sun all year round ); yet even with how much I dress up the Mun Can... it is still a rocket with the engine blown off.

Although, I still like this shot (you can see mountain at the mun's pole as well):

http://imgur.com/a/NPwYy#0

Looking to add some kind of hydroponics, and maybe a second Mun Can (as much as a pain it was to land the first one, ended up "skiing" it the last 800m because I wasn't experienced enough to get much closer than that.)
